Word_Entry.question: Asul
Word_Entry.notes: It's also the color of the sea.
Word_Entry.hint: Asul - It is like the color of the sky.

Word_Entry.question: Berde
Word_Entry.notes: It's also the color of crocodiles and alligators.
Word_Entry.hint: Berde - It is like the color of the grass and leaves.

Word_Entry.question: Pula
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of a firetruck.
Word_Entry.hint: Pula - It is like the color of apples.

Word_Entry.question: Dilaw
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of a rubber ducky.
Word_Entry.hint: Dilaw - It is like the color of the sun.

Word_Entry.question: Kayumanggi
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of the skin.
Word_Entry.hint: Kayumanggi - It is like the color of the trunk of a tree.

Word_Entry.question: Lila
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of grapes.
Word_Entry.hint: Lila - It is like the color of eggplants.

Word_Entry.question: Itim
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of car tires.
Word_Entry.hint: Itim - It is like the color of the night sky.

Word_Entry.question: Puti
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of doves.
Word_Entry.hint: Puti - It is like the color of the clouds.
